nodes.text: Meditation Grove was a clearing within the rain forest of the planet Monastery, near the Temple of the Sacred Circle. Priests of the Order of the Sacred Circle would frequently meditate before the calm pool in the center of the glade. Saber cats were treated as pets by the priests, and allowed to roam the grove freely. During the Mission to Monastery a misunderstanding led Luke Skywalker to kill a saber cat, believing it to be threatening Domina Tagge.
